subject: Re: Seven?
author: billliscomb
full_text:
from wikipedia:
Astronomy and mythology:

Pleiades (mythology), seven sisters who are companions of Artemis in 
Greek mythology 
Pleiades (star cluster), a star cluster named for the mythological 
characters 
The Hesperides of Greek mythology 
Churches:

The Seven Sisters of American Protestantism, an informal grouping of 
seven traditional mainline and liberal Protestant denominations: the 
Episcopal Church, the Presbyterian Church (USA), the Evangelical 
Lutheran Church in America, the American Baptist Churches, the 
Christian Church (Disciples of Christ), the United Church of Christ, 
and the United Methodist Church. 
Colleges:

Seven Sisters (colleges), a group of American women's colleges
